### ex: using information leak (2) soln  {.smaller}


* buffer address = 0x646d06d15040 - offset = 0x4040 

   * printed out actual value

* offset = 0x646d06d11000
* GOT entry address = 0x3fb0 + offset = 0x646d06d14fb0 

   * 0x3fb0 = jump slot location
